snippet: French Open prize money will increase by 14 percent this year, with the men's and women's champions winning 2 million euros ($2.25 million) each — an increase of 200,000 euros ($225,000)....
lead_paragraph: French Open prize money will increase by 14 percent this year, with the men's and women's champions winning 2 million euros ($2.25 million) each — an increase of 200,000 euros ($225,000).

headline.print_headline: French Open Prize Money Raised 14 Percent to 32 Million
headline.main: French Open Prize Money Raised 14 Percent to 32 Million
